mapper.insert: INSERT INTO apartment_info ( deal_amount, build_year, deal_year, deal_month, deal_day, dong, apartment_name, area_for_exclusive_use, jibun, flr, location_cd ) SELECT ${deal_amount}, #{build_year}, #{deal_year}, #{deal_month}, #{deal_day}, #{dong}, #{apartment_name}, #{area_for_exclusive_use}, #{jibun}, #{flr}, cd FROM location_code WHERE external_cd = #{location_cd}
